resources.string:
"This application was developed by INFS3605 M17A Group 1 in association with UNSW and Australian Red Cross." "

This app records user-submitted information on the environment in order to uncover valuable insights to help preserve and understand the impacts of climate change on the Indigenous culture and land." "

Please note that this app is not intended for commercial use, and any information submitted will not be used for any other purpose then to show proof of concept." "

For more information, please feel free to contact us on:"
